website_summaries.verdict: A professional-quality detector that gives you the choice of visual, audible, or vibration alert modes.
pros: Choose between 3 alert modes: visual, audible, or vibration
16-inch probe detects methane, hydrogen, hexane, and a variety of other gases
cons: Some buyers report problems with it either not detecting leaks or triggering way too easily
Initial calibration can be a little slow

customer_reviews.title: Nice Physical and Functional Design, Very Sensitive, Timeout Feature Can Be Limiting
customer_reviews.text: Bought unit to localize potential low level leak that several visitors have brought to our attention over the years. Unit not only detected methane in the entry to our home, but localized it to the gas line leading to the kitchen range from behind the fridge. The user calibrates the unit outside, where the ambient methane level is very low. Unit shuts down automatically after five minutes, which I find infuriating, especially when I'm under the house tracking down each gas line connector and the unit times out, requiring me to crawl back outside, re-calibrate then crawl back under the house to, hopefully, finish before the next timeout.
customer_reviews.author: RAYPICK

customer_reviews.title: The build quality of the RIDGID 36163 is very good but the product doesn’t function very well
customer_reviews.text: Very slow to detect gas. You have to hold the detect near a gas leak for a few seconds before it detects it. I purchased the General NDG8800 which is much more reactive, instantaneous alarm when exposed to combustible gases. The build quality of the RIDGID 36163 is very good but the product doesn’t function very well.
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: Able to detect Hydrogen / Hydrogen sulfide from Battery Bank
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for testing Hydrogen levels in my Battery storage container (24 x 2v 800ah Traction Lead acid Batteries) in my solar system. They gas considerably under charge. Wanted to ensure my ventilation system was sufficient. Appears to function well. Tested using Butane from a lighter. It appeared to function. I then re-zeroed and tested the Battery compartment readings from 160-320 PPM dependent on proximity to the batteries. As the batteries gas hydrogen and hydrogen sulfide, not sure which it is reading but both are of concern, so testing is worthwhile. Very Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Gijsbertsen

customer_reviews.title: Professional and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Nothing says you are a professional like having specialized tools for a job. Sure you can walk in with a business card and shoe covers, but if you’re definition of a gas leak detector is your nose, then you need to step up your game. Image is a big deal in service work and having a tool that the average person doesn’t have and being able to accurately pin point a leak and the severity of the leak speak volume to your credibility as a professional tradesman. The combustible gas detector is peace of mind for me after working on a gas line, but will never replace bubbles for a pressure test if that is needed.

product_meta.title: RIDGID 36163 Model micro CD-100 Combustible Gas Detector, Gas Leak Detector
product_meta.description:
Effective and easy to use, the RIDGID 36163 Combustible Gas Detector provides simple and quick readings to identify the presence of combustible gases. This gas leak detector is designed to detect Methane, Propane, Butane, Ethanol, Ammonia, Hydrogen and many other combustible gases. For safe and accurate detection, the micro CD-100 is the ideal tool to ensure proper gas line installations, check for maintenance and repair needs, or quickly pinpoint combustible gas leaks.

It features a rugged yet ergonomic design that offers comfort while at the same time withstanding rigorous jobsite use. The Tri-Mode Detection offers flexibility, allowing you to select between visual, audible and vibration alerts, and a 16-inch flexible probe allows location and detection of leaks in hard-to-reach and confined spaces. With adjustable sensitivity settings, even low-levels of gases can be detected in seconds. The gas detector has a field replaceable sensor for more up-time and less time waiting for repairs.

The CD-100 features automatic calibration, a detection range of 0 to 6400-ppm (Methane), an alarm sensitivity of 40-ppm (Methane) and uses 4 x AA batteries (included). Detects Methane, Hydrogen, Propane, Ethylene, Ethane, Hexane, Iso-Butane, Benzene, Ethanol, Acetaldehyde, Toluene, P-Xylene, Ammonia and Hydrogen Sulfide.

RIDGID covers its products with a lifetime warranty against defects in material or workmanship for the life of the tool.

Since 1923, RIDGID has remained the symbol of certainty to dedicated professionals of the expert trades. Every tool that bears the RIDGID brand is engineered to the same high standards of quality, strength and endurance, as was that first heavy-duty pipe wrench more than 80 years ago.

Tri-Mode Detection function lets you select between visual, audible and vibration alerts to best suit your environment
Adjustable sensitivity settings provide precise leak locating with the touch of a button
Field replaceable sensor allows for more up-time and less time waiting for repairs
16-inch (40 cm) flexible probe allows location and detection of leaks in hard-to-reach and confined spaces
